title: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
description: This is a randomized open-label, active-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in patients with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy. The study will enroll approximately 122 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 19-66 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
